    Project update

    A blog post about the project

    Posted on February 26, 2020

    If you want to include images place them in assets/img, but you don’t have to! Just leave out (delete) lines 5, 6, and 7 above and your post will be sans images.

    You can write Markdown blog posts to update people about your project. Place a new .md file in the _posts directory.

    All fun of Markdown can be used, bold, italics, Underline, strikethrough etc.

    • easy

    2. Lists
    3. Are
    4. Too!
